author: Vivienne Clarke, Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: Going to holiday home is ‘social sabotage’ – Michael Harty
description: Public should not expect restrictions to lift after weekend, Minister for Health says
content:
Minister for Health Simon Harris has said that it would not be a wise thing to expect public health restrictions to lift after this weekend. 
If we take the foot of the pedal, the progress weve made would be reversed, he told Newstalk Breakfast.
